article.headline: Weber State 69, Utah Valley State 62
article.story: OGDEN, Utah (AP) -- Weber State's Coric Riggs scored 18 points to lead Weber to a 69-62 victory over in-state rival Utah Valley State Wednesday night. David Heck scored a career-high 30 points for UVSC (6-7), hitting 12-of-19, including 6-for-9 from beyond the 3-point arc. Heck scored the Wolverines' first 10 points, and UVSC led 10-6 early in the first half. Weber State (6-6) answered with an 11-0 spurt, highlighted by Coric Riggs hitting three straight jumpers. The Wildcats closed out the first half by shooting 48 percent, and led 31-23 at halftime. Utah Valley cut Weber's lead to 45-44 with 10:35 remaining on Ben DeVoe's layup. However, WSU extended its lead to 63-50 over the next five minutes. The spurt was highlighted by a pair of alley-oop dunks by Riggs and another by David Patten. Despite a 10-2 run by UVSC in the game's final four minutes, the Wolverines ran out of time and their comeback fell short. Patten scored 14 points and grabbed nine rebounds for WSU. Terrell Stovall added 10 points and seven assists for the Wildcats. DeVoe had 12 points for UVSC. The Wildcats avenged a 68-49 loss to the Wolverines Dec. 6 in Orem. Utah Valley coach Dick Hunsaker, who played at Weber State from 1974-1977, is now 2-2 coaching against his alma mater.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
